channel.title: CVE Feed for Mercari, Inc. -- Android App 'Mercari' (Japan version)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mercari, Inc. -- Android App 'Mercari' (Japan version)

item.title: CVE-2020-5604|2024-08-04T08:30:24.580Z -- mercari%2C%20inc. -- android%20app%20%27mercari%27%20%28japan%20version%29
item.description: Android App 'Mercari' (Japan version) prior to version 3.52.0 allows arbitrary method execution of a Java object by a remote attacker via a Man-In-The-Middle attack by using Java Reflection API of JavaScript code on WebView.
